meanings.definition: A dental X-ray that shows the crowns of the upper and lower teeth in a single image.
meanings.sent1: During my dental check-up, the dentist asked me to get a bitewing to check for cavities.
meanings.sent2: The bitewing X-ray helped the dentist identify the decay between my molars.
meanings.sent3: I joked with the dentist that the bitewing X-ray made my teeth look like tiny castles.
meanings.sent4: The bitewing X-ray revealed a hidden world of dental health beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The bitewing X-ray captured a detailed snapshot of my tooth structure.

meanings.definition: A small wing-like projection on a bit or drill.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic attached a bitewing to the drill for more precise cutting.
meanings.sent2: The bitewing on the drill helped create a smoother edge on the wood.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the bitewing on the drill was a tiny airplane taking off.
meanings.sent4: The bitewing on the drill sliced through the material with ease, like a sharp wing.
meanings.sent5: The bitewing on the drill added a touch of precision to the woodworking project.
